Changing the way you play.

Music Mate eliminates prep time to lead music.

Copy.

Go to ultimate-guitar.com to find songs. Copy all lyric headers & guitar chords.

Paste.

Paste each song below in the reformater.

Play.

Try all the buttons! Each button puts all the songs in a single file, but applies a different formatting.
